ctrl

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctrl.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GuiInterface

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements GuiInterface
    Hosts constants and methods that are available to all other controllers.
